ARTICLE.TITLE: 2020 ADA Annual Session will be a virtual event
ARTICLE.TEXT:
-- The ADA and Florida Dental Association have announced that the 2020 Annual Session, a combined event for both organizations set for October 15 to 18 in Orlando, will be moved to an online-only meeting.

According to the ADA, the Association's Board of Trustees voted June 12 to cancel the in-person gathering. The associations are exploring virtual options for the meeting and will share more information as it becomes available.

"A decision will be made in the near future as to whether the ADA House of Delegates will meet in person. These decisions have been made after extensive research, careful deliberation, and feedback from our members and past attendees," the ADA said in a statement posted on their website.
